Reviews.title: STAKE SCAM MY 1924$ ACCOUNT PERMANANTLY DISABLE
Reviews.detailed_review:
On June 20, Stake.com suspended my account with my $1,924 funds, effectively locking my hard-earned money and blocking withdrawals.

They demanded ID documents with a selfie, utility bills, and income source documents for verification.

I sent them all the required documents: ID with a selfie, utility bills, and income source documents.

My ID and selfie were verified without any issues.

The problem started at level 3 verification when they began rejecting all my address documents.

I submitted multiple address documents, including:
- Electricity bill
- Water bill
- Employer letter
- Tax documents
- Gas bill


They rejected each of these documents one by one, seemingly deliberately, as if they just wanted to scam me out of my $1,924.

This ordeal and mental harassment continued until July 15.

On July 15, when I tried to log in to my account, I received a message stating that my Stake.com account had been permanently disabled and my funds were frozen.

Stake.com has Successfully scammed me out of my $1,924.

Their support team is not responding, and the account management team account team who did this is also not replying.

I am frustrated and stressed out because they have stolen my hard-earned money after harassing me for a month.

My only suggestion is to stay away from Stake.com if you value your money, as they can scam your deposits at any time.

STAKE USERNAME KOZUK12

Reviews.title: Stake quality of website gone to 0%
Reviews.detailed_review: I've been on Stake for a while now, and you can't convince me stake isn't fraudulent in their activities. I wouldn't be able to fit in all the words about everything i've experienced on Stake. 500$ deposited today to spin slots and I can't make this up, not a SINGLE trajectory upwards in my gambling session chart, straight down, no bump ups, no hits. straight down. Imagine 10+ pages of deposits (100+).. and guess what 1 withdrawal. not 1 page of withdrawals, ONE withdrawal. and that was because I needed spare money in the moment. I frequently go 1000 spins without a bonus on majority of slots, and when i get a bonus, it pays 10x the bet size; Lose 200$ to make 3$, is usually how it goes every session. in the past 3 months, 90 deposits, once a day, and 0 withdrawals, and I'm not even aiming to make millions or hundreds of thousands, maybe just some of RTP That i'm still yet to see. I would love to be able to deposit and 3x-4x my balance and leave, but can't even 2x or 1.5x it. charts straight red every session, most slots claim 90% rtp but I've literally spun every single pragmatic slot on stake, and haven't even hit a 1000x. Is my account limited? No clue; literally never won so I don't know why I would be. They say it's luck but that's lies. I've done a lot of gamble actives, pack openings which have WAY less odds than stake rewarding for what you put in, but somehow still manage to get rewarded more times than stake. I Put so much time and effort into stake feeling like I should be getting back a fraction of what I put in, but never ever won and now im convinced never will.
